translation.appSubTitle: Drop any files to any devices on your LAN
translation.crossPlatformDetails: We mean it—iOS, Android, macOS, Windows, Linux, Android TV, and more. LANDrop works seamlessly across all major platforms.
translation.ultraFastSecureDetails: LANDrop uses advanced protocols to deliver line-rate transfer speeds along with military-grade encryption and authentication for top-notch security.
translation.noDataUsageDetails: On the go? No worries—LANDrop works with your personal hotspot, without using cellular data.
translation.losslessTransfersDetails: LANDrop transfers your photos and videos without any compression, ensuring they remain high quality.
translation.nearbySharingDetails: LANDrop can detect nearby devices even if they're not on the same Wi-Fi network. Using WebRTC, it enables file transfers to those devices.
translation.trustedDevicesDetails: Add trusted devices in LANDrop and automatically accept file transfers from them without needing approval each time.
translation.featuresDetails: LANDrop automatically detects other devices running LANDrop on the same Wi-Fi network, so you don't need to enter IP addresses manually. Unlike other apps, there's no need to set up a server. LANDrop handles everything behind the scenes—just like AirDrop, but cross-platform.
translation.privacyPolicyDetails:
Thank you for using LANDrop!

SkyArc LLC is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your personal data.

Data Storage and Usage:

  • We do not collect, share, or store any of your personal data.
  • All personal data required for the normal operation of the app are stored entirely and exclusively on your device.

File Transfers:

  • When you send or receive files to or from other devices, your device's name, type, and/or local IP address may be shared with the other party.
  • You can choose not to actively share this information by turning off "Discoverable" in the app.
  • This information is not collected, shared, or stored by SkyArc LLC in any way and is only used for the necessary operation of the app.

Analytics and Usage Data:

  • To better serve our customers, we may gather analytics and usage data. This data helps us understand how our app is used and improve its performance and functionality.
  • The analytics and usage data collected will be anonymized and will not include any personal data.

If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, please send an email to privacy@landrop.app.

Thank you for your trust in LANDrop!

SkyArc LLC
translation.cantFindOtherDevices: I can't find other devices. What should I do?
translation.cantFindOtherDevicesAnswer: Ensure that all your devices have the latest version of LANDrop and are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. LANDrop uses UDP multicast and broadcast to discover devices. If other devices aren't showing up, your router may not support these protocols. Try connecting your devices to a phone's hotspot to check. If that works, it's likely your router is the issue.
translation.cantReceiveFiles: My Windows computer can't receive files from my phone. What should I do?
translation.cantReceiveFilesAnswer: This is a known issue on Windows. You can resolve it by clicking the "Fix Firewall" button in the app's settings.
translation.landropIsSlow: LANDrop is slow. How can I fix it?
translation.landropIsSlowAnswer: LANDrop needs a stable Wi-Fi connection for optimal performance. If your signal is strong, it should fully utilize your available bandwidth. For better speed, newer Wi-Fi standards like Wi-Fi 6, Wi-Fi 6E, or Wi-Fi 7 are recommended.
translation.transferBetweenNetworks: Can LANDrop transfer files between devices on different networks?
translation.transferBetweenNetworksAnswer: Yes, if the devices can connect via IP address (using methods like port forwarding). You can use the "Add via IP and Port" feature for file transfers. We're also working on a feature to transfer files between devices on different networks without requiring port forwarding.
translation.doesLANDropUploadToCloud: Does LANDrop upload my files to the cloud?
translation.doesLANDropUploadToCloudAnswer: No, LANDrop transfers files directly between devices, peer-to-peer, without using the cloud.
translation.doesLANDropUseData: Does LANDrop use my data plan?
translation.doesLANDropUseDataAnswer: No, unless you're sharing files to a nearby device while not connected to Wi-Fi.
translation.doesLANDropCompress: Does LANDrop compress my photos and videos?
translation.doesLANDropCompressAnswer: No, LANDrop transfers files without compression.
translation.moreQuestions: I have more questions. How can I contact you?
translation.moreQuestionsAnswer: Join our Discord server, and we'd be happy to assist you.

translation.appSubTitle: 跨平台局域网文件传输工具
translation.crossPlatformDetails: 我们支持 iOS、Android、macOS、Windows、Linux、Android TV 等操作系统。LANDrop 在所有主要平台上无缝运行。
translation.ultraFastSecureDetails: LANDrop 使用先进的协议，提供满速传输，并采用军用级加密和身份验证，确保一流的安全性。
translation.noDataUsageDetails: 在外面？不用担心——LANDrop 可通过个人热点工作，无需使用移动数据。
translation.losslessTransfersDetails: LANDrop 传输您的照片和视频时不进行任何压缩，确保它们的高质量。
translation.nearbySharingDetails: 即使不在同一 Wi-Fi 网络上，LANDrop 也可以检测到附近的设备，并通过 WebRTC 向它们传输。
translation.trustedDevicesDetails: 您可以在 LANDrop 中添加信任设备，自动接受这些设备的文件传输，而无需每次都进行确认。
translation.featuresDetails: LANDrop 会自动检测同一 Wi-Fi 网络上的其他 LANDrop 设备，因此您无需手动输入 IP 地址。LANDrop 会在后台处理一切——就像一个跨平台的 AirDrop 一样。
translation.privacyPolicyDetails:
感谢您使用 LANDrop！

SkyArc LLC 致力于保护您的隐私。本隐私政策概述了我们如何处理您的个人数据。

数据存储和使用：

  • 我们不收集、共享或存储您的任何个人数据。
  • 应用程序正常运行所需的所有个人数据完全且仅存储在您的设备上。

文件传输：

  • 当您向其他设备发送或接收文件时，您的设备名称、类型和/或本地 IP 地址可能会与对方共享。
  • 您可以通过关闭应用程序中的“可被发现”选项来选择不主动共享此信息。
  • 这些信息不会以任何方式被 SkyArc LLC 收集、共享或存储，仅用于应用程序的必要操作。

分析和使用数据：

  • 为了更好地服务我们的客户，我们可能会收集分析和使用数据。这些数据有助于我们了解应用程序的使用情况，并改进其性能和功能。
  • 收集的分析和使用数据将被匿名化，不会包含任何个人数据。

如果您对本隐私政策有任何疑问，请发送电子邮件至 privacy@landrop.app。

感谢您对 LANDrop 的信任！

SkyArc LLC
translation.cantFindOtherDevices: 我找不到其他设备。应该怎么做？
translation.cantFindOtherDevicesAnswer: 请确保您的所有设备都安装了最新版本的 LANDrop，并且连接到同一个 Wi-Fi 网络。LANDrop 使用 UDP 组播和广播来发现设备。如果找不到其他设备，可能是您的路由器不支持这些协议。您可以尝试将设备连接到手机的热点。如果可以连接，问题可能出在您的路由器上。
translation.cantReceiveFiles: 我的 Windows 电脑无法从手机接收文件。应该怎么做？
translation.cantReceiveFilesAnswer: 这是 Windows 上的已知问题。您可以通过在设置中点击“修复防火墙”按钮来解决。
translation.landropIsSlow: LANDrop 速度很慢。如何解决？
translation.landropIsSlowAnswer: LANDrop 需要稳定的 Wi-Fi 连接才能获得最佳性能。如果信号足够强，可以用满带宽。为获得更好的速度，建议使用更新的 Wi-Fi 标准，如 Wi-Fi 6、Wi-Fi 6E 或 Wi-Fi 7。
translation.transferBetweenNetworks: LANDrop 可以在不同网络的设备之间传输文件吗？
translation.transferBetweenNetworksAnswer: 可以，如果设备可以通过 IP 地址连接（例如使用端口转发）。您可以使用“通过 IP 和端口添加”功能进行文件传输。我们也正在开发无需端口转发就可以在不同网络的设备之间传输文件的功能。
translation.doesLANDropUploadToCloud: LANDrop 会将我的文件上传到云端吗？
translation.doesLANDropUploadToCloudAnswer: 不会，LANDrop 直接在设备之间进行点对点文件传输，不使用云端。
translation.doesLANDropUseData: LANDrop 会使用我的数据流量吗？
translation.doesLANDropUseDataAnswer: 不会，除非您在没有连接 Wi-Fi 的情况下向附近设备共享文件。
translation.doesLANDropCompress: LANDrop 会压缩我的照片和视频吗？
translation.doesLANDropCompressAnswer: 不会，LANDrop 传输文件时不会进行压缩。
translation.moreQuestions: 我有更多问题。如何联系你们？
translation.moreQuestionsAnswer: 加入我们的 Discord 服务器，我们很乐意为您提供帮助。
